description: I chose DITRA XL because it's 5/16" thick. This made it even with the height of the shower pan. Bottom line, always think through the details before buying supplies for your curbless shower. This full tutorial series is available inside our Video Library for Gold and Platinum members at https://homerepairtutor.com/platinum-membership/
title: How to Install DITRA for Curbless Shower - #shorts #homerepairtutor
